title: Marine Omics identifying biosynthetic gene clusters
questions: Which biological questions are addressed by the tutorial?
Which bioinformatics techniques are important to know for this type of data?
objectives: Learn to conduct a secondary metabolite biosynthetic gene cluster (SMBGC) Annotation
Discover SanntiS a tool for identifying BGCs in genomic & metagenomic data

workflows.name: Marine Omics identifying biosynthetic gene clusters
workflows.title: Marine Omics identifying biosynthetic gene clusters
workflows.description: Secondary metabolite biosynthetic gene cluster (SMBGC) Annotation using Neural Networks Trained on Interpro Signatures
